price: O you who believe, shall I tell you about a trade that will save you from a painful punishment?
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكُمۡ عَلَىٰ تِجَٰرَةٖ تُنجِيكُم مِّنۡ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
